QuestData.Title: Distress Call
QuestData.Description: Oh good, you're $n, right?$B$BWe need your help up north at Fizzcrank Airstrip, like yesterday! The magnataur, and the Scourge... and the pumping station!$B$BIt's madness I tell you, madness!$B$BYou've got to head up there and talk to old man Fullthrottle a.s.a.p.!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Fizzcrank Fullthrottle at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestData.RewardText: I see that Skyhopper finally got around to sending help. And none too soon I might add!$B$BWelcome, $g brother : sister;, we need your help badly!
